original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 320.00/50 to the US dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee was unchanged at 320.00/320.50 to the US dollar on Tuesday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted down at 12.90/13.05 after closing on Tuesday at 13.05/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 was quoted down at 13.10/30 percent after closing at 13.30/45 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted down at 13.95/14.05 percent after closing at 14.25/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted down at 13.05/14.15 percent from closing at 14.40/55 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted down 15.45/60 after closing at 15.90/16.00 percent. (Colombo/Aug08/2023)
